Processor.name: GrayscaleCL
Processor.Description: Converts a color image to grayscale version using an OpenCL kernel.

Processor.name: RaytracingEntryExitPoints
Processor.Description: Raytraces the Proxygeometry to create Entry/Exit points. The generated image color-codes the ray parameters for a subsequent VolumeRaycaster. See CubeMeshGeometry

Processor.name: VolumeGradientCL
Processor.Description: OpenCL-based version of the VolumeGradient processor.
